page.title: 03My Typical Day
page.content:
Luke Charles Aged 8 MONDAY May 13TH 1985
I wake up naturally.Then I wash and dress and go downstairs to lay the table for all the the family.After breakfast we drive off to Mrs Waterhouse's because my parents both work.She takes us to school.When we get to school I have a play for five minutes.Then we go in and after service we work at Scottish Primary Maths,English and reading.I'm reading 'Old Dog New Tricks'by Dick Cate.After dinner we have a long playtime.Four boys take their jumpers off for goal posts and we play football.In the afternoon we do activities like art. I made a puppet of Kenny Dalglish, the Liverpool footballer.When we go home I watch the cartoons,have tea,read my book.Then we go to bed.
